description.0: A fan carved from pure jade, around which swirls an ancient aura of adeptal energy.

0.0: After the equipping character hits an opponent with a Plunging Attack, all nearby party members' Plunging Attacks will deal <cryo>28%</cryo> increased DMG for 20s. When nearby party members hit opponents with Plunging Attacks, they will restore <cryo>2.5</cryo> Energy to the equipping character. Energy can be restored this way every 0.7s. This energy regain effect can be triggered even if the equipping character is not on the field.
